creator: Dave@JungleMoss.com
text:
I have created VC6 build files to build mod_webapp.dll. All are new files, no 
patches. The build files for AP2.0 and NSAPI are not yet complete.
They should be put into the following directories:
jakarta-tomcat-connectors\webapp\
    mod_webapp.dsw
jakarta-tomcat-connectors\webapp\apache-1.3
    mod_webapp.dsp
jakarta-tomcat-connectors\webapp\apache-2.0
    mod_webapp.dsp
jakarta-tomcat-connectors\webapp\nsapi
    mod_webapp.dsp
jakarta-tomcat-connectors\webapp\support
    buildjar.bat

Created attachment 666
Here is a zip of the files in the format as described
creator: Dave@JungleMoss.com

text:
Thank you for the contribution. Instead of having .dsp files for Visual 
Studio, I'd rather have makefiles for those (like me) who don't have the 
IDE installed but just the compiler. I'll see if I can generate those out of 
your DSPs...
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text:
This might come handy one day when someone will decide to maintain a 
Windows port.
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text:
Webapp is no longer actively developed (and was never a very good choice for 
running on Windows).
creator: remm@apache.org
